Articles.Content:
So I have finally created an account here after a year of playing and reading threads. I felt with beta coming out, and me getting back into the game, the forum was only logical. So, I hope to contribute and develop within the forum as this amazing game continues to grow with us.

"Space exploration is a force of nature unto itself that no other force in society can rival."

~ Neil deGrasse Tyson

Welcome! Glad you joined.

I have found these forums to be a great place to learn and share your experiences.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the forums! Be prepared to spend more time here than you do in the actual game

Seriously though, happy to have another member added to the community

May your exhaust always be hot, your TWR above 1 and your Isp high!

Welcome aboard! I can't quite remember where it's from, but I'll throw a quote right back at you!

"The dinosaurs went extinct because they didn't have a space program."
